product_name: The North Face Miss Metro Down Parka - Women's
long_description: To commute, shop or trek to the museum in wet, winter weather, wrap your body in the long, down-filled Miss Metro parka from The North Face. Even the hood is insulated for those really blustery days. High-quality, water-resistant 600-fill-power down is warm, lightweight and compressible. Water-resistant down is treated to stay drier longer and dry faster than untreated down. Nylon satin lining slides on easily over layers. Insulated, adjustable hood removes when not needed. Two-way center-front zipper eases sitting; snap placket keeps out drafts; chin guard protects neck. The North Face Miss Metro down parka features an internal media pocket and zippered hand pockets. Metal logo rivet at left bicep; embroidered logo on back right shoulder.
short_description: To commute, shop or trek to the museum in wet, winter weather, wrap your body in the long, down-filled Miss Metro parka from The North Face. Even the hood is insulated for those really blustery days.
